name: Click to Call, SMS, Messages, Email and 40+ social icons – GP Sticky buttons
author: Ginger Plugins

sections.description:
GP Sticky Button consists of 44 channels so you can quickly connect your website visitors and they can contact you or share his/her views about your website or services via any of these channels. As a website owner, you can also quickly react to their questions and convert the website visitor into a genuine lead.

GP Sticky Button is a Free & Light Weight WordPress plugin. you can show a list of buttons at any place on your website so that your visitors can quickly contact you and share their requirements.

Benefits

  • Freedom for visitors to choose the channel from 44 channels
  • Generate authentic leads & good ROI
  • Stay available 24*7 for your customers with GP sticky buttons
  • Fulfill the requirement of your customer quickly
  • Provide quick solutions to the queries of vVisitors
  • Increase the visibility of social media channels

Features

  1. 40+ Channels all channels are free of cost.
  2. Choose the desired location to display the button from Top, Bottom, Left, or Right.
  3. GP Sticky Button also provides a theme selection option. You can choose the shape of the icons from round, rounded, diamond, or arrow.
  4. Set animation for the call to action button from none, slide, or fade.
  5. Choose background colors for your Buttons.
  6. Select the custom color for each button.
  7. You can order your button setting tab with drag and drop.
  8. An individual can select whether to display the button on mobile, desktop, or both.
  9. Change the font of all the button text.
  10. Change the button tooltip Text.
  11. You can also choose when to display the widget like on a scroll or after a few decided seconds.
  12. Enable or disable Buttons.
  13. Fully customizable and responsive

Sticky buttons provide below buttons to show on your website

Amazon
App Store
Behance
Bitbucket
Calendar
Dribbble
Ebay
Etsy
Facebook
Facebook Messenger
Flickr
Github
Google play store
Instagram
Itunes
Line
Contact Us
Linkedin
Mail
Map
Medium
Phone
Pinterest
QQ
Quora
Reddit
RSS
Skype
Slack
SMS
Snapchat
Soundcloud
Spotify
Telegram
Tripadvisor
Tumblr
Twitter
Viber
Vimeo
Vk
WeChat
Whatsapp
Yelp
YouTube
sections.installation:
1. Click Plugins/Add New from the WordPress admin panel
  2. Search for “GP Sticky Buttons” and install

-or-

  1. Download the .zip package
  2. Unzip into the subdirectory ‘gp-sticky-buttons’ within your local WordPress plugins directory
  3. Refresh plugin page and activate plugin
sections.faq:
GP Sticky Buttons and GDPR compliance?

This plugin doesnâ€™t collect any personal information.
